verses.verse: God, <S%G2316><s%> after He spoke <S%G2980><s%> long <S%G3819><s%> ago <S%G3819><s%> to the fathers <S%G3962><s%> in the prophets <S%G4396><s%> in many <S%G4181><s%> portions <S%G4181><s%> and in many <S%G4187><s%> ways, <S%G4187><s%>

in these <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> has spoken <S%G2980><s%> to us in [His] Son, <S%G5207><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He appointed <S%G5087><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> He made <S%G4160><s%> the world. <S%G165><s%>

And He is the radiance <S%G541><s%> of His glory <S%G1391><s%> and the exact <S%G5481><s%> representation <S%G5481><s%> of His nature, <S%G5287><s%> and upholds <S%G5342><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of His power. <S%G1411><s%> When He had made <S%G4160><s%> purification <S%G2512><s%> of sins, <S%G266><s%> He sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> at the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> on high; <S%G5308><s%>

having become <S%G1096><s%> as much <S%G5118><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> than the angels, <S%G32><s%> as He has inherited <S%G2816><s%> a more <S%G1313><s%> excellent <S%G1313><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> they.

For to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> did He ever <S%G4218><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> My Son, <S%G5207><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> Thee"? And again, <S%G3825><s%> "I will be a Father <S%G3962><s%> to Him And He shall be a Son <S%G5207><s%> to Me"?

And when <S%G3752><s%> He again <S%G3825><s%> brings <S%G1521><s%> the first-born into the world, <S%G3625><s%> He says, <S%G3004><s%> "And let all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> Him."
And of the angels <S%G32><s%> He says, <S%G3004><s%>"Who makes <S%G4160><s%> His angels <S%G32><s%> winds, <S%G4151><s%> And His ministers <S%G3011><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>"

But of the Son <S%G5207><s%> [He says], "Thy throne, <S%G2362><s%> O God, <S%G2316><s%> is forever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> And the righteous <S%G2118><s%> scepter <S%G4464><s%> is the scepter <S%G4464><s%> of His kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

"Thou hast loved <S%G25><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and hated <S%G3404><s%> lawlessness; <S%G458><s%> Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Thy God, <S%G2316><s%> hath anointed <S%G5548><s%> Thee With the oil <S%G1637><s%> of gladness <S%G20><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> Thy companions. <S%G3353><s%>"

And, "Thou, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> in the beginning <S%G746><s%> didst lay <S%G2311><s%> the foundation <S%G2311><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> And the heavens <S%G3772><s%> are the works <S%G2041><s%> of Thy hands; <S%G5495><s%>
They will perish, <S%G622><s%> but Thou remainest; <S%G1265><s%> And they all <S%G3956><s%> will become <S%G3822><s%> old <S%G3822><s%> as a garment, <S%G2440><s%>

And as a mantle <S%G4018><s%> Thou wilt roll <S%G1667><s%> them up; As a garment <S%G2440><s%> they will also <S%G2532><s%> be changed. <S%G236><s%> But Thou art <S%G1510><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> And Thy years <S%G2094><s%> will not come <S%G1587><s%> to an end. <S%G1587><s%>"

But to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> has He ever <S%G4218><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Sit <S%G2521><s%> at My right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G1188><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> Thine <S%G4771><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> A footstool <S%G5286><s%> for Thy feet <S%G4228><s%>"?

Are they not all <S%G3956><s%> ministering <S%G3010><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> out to render service <S%G1248><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who will <S%G3195><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>?
